column1: ISMIP6 - Antarctica Initialization experiments (wiki Table 2, Tier 1)

column4: Needed to bring model from initial state to projection start date (January 1, 2015)
Unforced control run starting from projection start date (January 2015), needed to evaluate model drift due to the historical run. Setup is similar to projections but with no anomalies.

column3: Experiments that should be done by all groups, if possible
Experiments that are optional. Groups can chose to focus on one aspect of these experiments.

column7: Tier 2           (Table 2 wiki; experiments with repeat forcing, low emissions, shelf collapse)
